text:
Hey everybody :wave:

A good friend of mine is looking for a new role as a marketing-automation specialist.
The last couple of years she worked with Marketo and is currently doing her Salesforce-admin certification. Besides that, I've worked few times on different HubSpot projects with her.
She's located in the EU and speaks German, Russian, English.
If anyone knows anyone who's hiring(EU might be benefitial) and I could send her this way, it would be amazing.
Thank you

I'm looking for a third-party firm that we can delegate Enterprise HubSpot modifications to, like migrating from ZenDesk to HubSpot, modifying aspects of our production account, switching teams from DialPad to Zoom and that's just to name a few. If anyone has recommendations for firms or contractors we can work with then please DM me or respond in this thread. This is for a single business currently, but our portfolio is built up of 70 business and growing and it could turn into more depending on the services offered, especially there's experience with customizing both HubSpot and SalesForce. Thank you.

Hi !
I work at <https://www.markentive.com/en/|Markentive>, weâ€™re HubSpot Elite Partner.
We have 40+ consultant and developers and are used to deal with migrations or any HubSpot project.
Do not hesitate to DM me if interested :slightly_smiling_face:
